attributes.action: Go to HER Royal Majesty and call an ELECTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand Rht Hon Gordon Brown MP Prime Minister should see Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II without any further delay and ask Her Majesty to dissolve  Parliment and call a General Election without any delay.... We believe Mr Brown has no longer got the confidence of The people of the United Kingdom or of Parliment itself.  Mr Brown please GO NOW...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
